seller.health.recommendations.alert.mess: Your account health is critical. Complete the high-priority actions immediately to avoid account suspension.
seller.health.recommendations.header.des: Follow these recommendations to improve your account health and performance.
seller.health.recommendations.state.exce: Your account is in excellent standing. No immediate actions required.
seller.health.recommendations.tips.accur: Maintain accurate product listings with clear descriptions and images
seller.health.recommendations.tips.cance: Only cancel orders when absolutely necessary
seller.health.recommendations.tips.polic: Follow all marketplace policies and guidelines
seller.health.recommendations.tips.quali: Ensure product quality to minimize returns
seller.health.recommendations.tips.respo: Respond to customer messages within 24 hours
seller.health.recommendations.tips.shipO: Ship orders on time and provide accurate tracking information
seller.health.recommendations.tips.title: General Best Practices
seller.health.violations.header.descript: Review and resolve any policy violations to maintain account health.
seller.health.violations.header.title: Policy Violations
seller.health.violations.state.empty.des: Your account has no policy violations. Keep maintaining high standards!
